title: Ant, Bug and Cat
sentences: Ant, Bug and Cat
Ant has an apple
Bug has a bun
Cat has a can
Ant has an ax
Bug has a box
Cat has cups
Ant cuts the apple, bug cuts the bun
Cat cuts the can
Ant, bug and cat had a snack

title: The Den
sentences: The Den
Dog has a disk
Egg has a red net
Fox has fun
Dog digs a den
Egg helps dog
Fox has fun
Dog is in the den
Egg is in the den
Fox can't have fun

title: Gull's Gum
sentences: Gull's Gum
Gull is on the hill
Hen is on the hill
Gull has a hat
Gull has gum
Hen gets the gum
Hen hums!
Gull hits hen
Gull gets the gum
The gum is on the hat

title: Jen's Jet
sentences: Jen's Jet
Jen has a jet
The jet has a kit
The kit has a log
The kit has a lamp
Jen jumps in the jet
Jen jumps into the lot
The log is lit
The lamp is lit
Jen is glad

title: Meg's Mat
sentences: Meg's Mat
Meg has an odd mat
Meg has a mug
Meg's mat is a mop
Meg has a nut
Meg's mat is a net
Meg has a pot
Meg's mat is a box
Meg has a nap
Meg's mat is a mat!

title: Pam's Quiz
sentences: Pam's Quiz
Pam has a quiz
It is red
It is quick
Pam can pat it. What is it?
It is a red ram!
Pam has a quiz. It is pink
It is quite big
Pam can sit on it. What is it?
It is a pink quilt!

title: Ten Bugs
sentences: Ten Bugs
Ten bugs sit
Ten bugs sit in a van
Ten bugs sit
Ten bugs sit in the sun
Ten bugs hug
Ten bugs hug in the sun
Ten bugs run
Ten bugs run in the sun
Ten bugs hum in the van!

title: Zed's Zigzag
sentences: Zed's Zigzag
Wombat has a wig
The wig is wet
Fox has a box
The box has a zip
Yak yaps
Yak yells!
Zed zigs
Zed zags
Zed is a zigzag

title: Dan and the Ram
sentences: Dan and the Ram
Dan is a man. The man is Dan
Dan has a fan. The fan is tan!
Dan spots a ram. The ram is mad
Dan ran to the dam. The mad ram ran to the dam
Dan is at the dam. The mad ram is at the dam. Dan is sad
The ram spots the fan. The ram asks, "Fan?"
Oh! It is the ram's fan!
The ram is not mad. The ram is glad
The ram has the fan. Dan pats the ram!

title: Jen's Pet Hen
sentences: Jen's Pet Hen
Jen has a pet hen. The hen is red
Jen has a pen. Jen's pet hen is in the pen
Is the hen sad? Jen pats the hen
The hen has an egg. The hen is not sad!
The egg is in the nest. The hen is on the egg
The egg is wet! Jen pats the egg
The egg is hot! Jen has a fan!
The hen has a nap. Jen has a nap. Is it the end?
Jen has two pets! Jen is glad

title: The Big Fin
sentences: The Big Fin
Tim is a kid. Liz is a kid
Tim and Liz are kids. They sit in the sand
Tim has a bin. Liz has a lid
Tim and Liz mix the wet sand. They mix the sand in the bin
The sand is a big ram. The ram has a fan
Tim hits the sand. Liz is in the sand
Liz is mad. She spots a fin and a pin
Tim spots the fin. He is sad
Liz has the fin and the pin! Liz is glad!

title: Hot Dogs
sentences: Hot Dogs
Bob is a dog. He has a box
A pot and hot dogs are in the box. An ax is on top
Bob has the ax. He gets the log
Bob is hot. He mops his wet neck
Bob rips the box. The log is hot
Bob has the pot. He fills the pot
The pot is on the hot log. The hot dogs are in the pot
Bob is hot. He mops his wet hands
Oh! The hot dog has a hot dog!

title: The Bug and the Pup
sentences: The Bug and the Pup
The pup is in the sun. He is hot
The pup is on the rug. He has a nap
The bug is on the pup. He hugs the pup
The pup hits the bug. He has a nap
The bug is mad! He has a mug and a cup
The mug is on the pup! The cup is on the pup
The pup hits the bug. He has a nap
The sun sets. The pup gets up
The pup is red. The bug is glad!

title: Pam and Dave in the Cave
sentences: Pam and Dave in the Cave
This is Pam. This is Dave. Pam and Dave are pals
Pam and Dave spot a map. It is a map to a big cave!
Pam has a cape and a cake. Dave has a lamp and a rake
Pam and Dave go to the cave. The cave is in a lake
A name is on the gate of the cave. It is the "Big Bat's Cave."
Pam and Dave are in the cave. The cave is wet and dim
Pam spots a big bat! The big bat spots the cake!
Pam and Dave are brave. They pass the cake to the big bat
The big bat is glad! Pam and Dave get a cane!

title: Jim and Mike's Time
sentences: Jim and Mike's Time
It is six! It is time to wake up!
Jim has a bite of a lime. Mike has a bite of a bun
Jim and Mike ride to the gate. Jim and Mike wave at the gate
It is five. It is time for a bike ride!
Jim rides to the pine. Mike rides to the vines
Jim is in the pine. Mike has a vine. It is a game!
It is nine! It is time for bed
Jim wipes his neck. Mike wipes his leg
Jim and Mike are in bed. They had a fun time!

title: Tom and Jane Go Home
sentences: Tom and Jane Go Home
This is Tom. This is Jane. This is Tom and Jane's home
Tom and Jane hope to get home. But, there is a lock
The home has a hole. Tom and Jane hope to get in the hole!
Tom spots a rope. He lobs the rope at the hole
Tom tugs on the rope. The rope drops
Jane spots a pole! Tom and Jane fix the rope to the pole
Jane lobs the pole. The rope and pole do not drop!
Tom and Jane go up the rope. They go to the hole
Tom and Jane spot Mom. Oh, no! Mom is mad!

title: Jude on the Dune
sentences: Jude on the Dune
The sun is hot. Jude is on the dune
Jude has no gum. He has no cone
Jude is sad. He is lost in the dunes
Jude is hot. He takes a nap!
Jude spots a mule! He is glad. But, the mule is a tube!
Jude spots a pup! It is cute. But, the cute pup is a bug!
Jude spots a vine. It is long. But, the long vine is a fuse!
Jude spots a lake. It is big. But, can he jump in?
Yes! Jude runs to the lake and has a dip

title: Clem the Brave
sentences: Clem the Brave
Clem is the brave man in the frame. He has a club and a flag
Clem has a blade. It is made of flame
A crab spots Clem. The crab has the blade of flame
Clem flips the blade. The crab is tame!
A clam spots Clem. It claps at Clem, but he can block
The club is in the clam. The clam is tame!
The prize is close. It is on top of the cliff
Clem gets the prize. It is a black flag
Clem is brave, but Mom is sad

title: Glen and Drake's Trip
sentences: Glen and Drake's Trip
Glen and Drake have a plan. They will travel the globe
Glen and Drake have a plan. They will go up the slick slope
Glen drives to the slope. He drives in a truck
Drake has a sled and a trunk. They are for the trip to the top
The slope is slick! Glen drops the sled
Drake is quick! He drags the sled up
Glen treks to the top. He spots the truck
Drake treks to the top. He has a drink from the trunk
Glen and Drake slide home on the sled. They get a prize. It is a glass globe

title: The Bank in Hong Kong
sentences: The Bank in Hong Kong
The bank in Hong Kong is quite long
It is on the strip next to the dock
The king has a ring. It is made of a pink stone
The king stops at the bank. He brings the ring home
The skunk has a stripe. It makes a stink
The skunk snaps the stripe on its back. It smiles and winks!
The snake is swift. It swims to the bank!
The snake gets its tank. It sits in the tank and snores
The bank in Hong Kong has a line. The line is quite long!

title: The White Fish
sentences: The White Fish
Beth has a plan. The plan is to get her wish
Beth has a plan. The plan is to see the white fish
She does the math. She figures the path
She has a fish and a ship. She runs the plan in the bath
Beth sits on the white ship. She has a chest
Beth has fins in the chest. She has a branch in the chest
Beth dives into the sea. She makes a splash!
Beth sees the white fish. It swims by in a flash!
Beth got her wish. She chased the white fish!

title: The Shoal Beast
sentences: The Shoal Beast
A strong wind blows on the sea. It blows to the east
The sea flows to the east. It flows to the home of the Shoal Beast
A green boat floats on the sea. It floats to the east
Jean is on the green boat. Joan is on the green boat
Jean has a bowl of seeds. Joan has a box of tea
The sea roars! The Shoal Beast soars!
Jean and Joan see the beast! The beast sees Jean and Joan
Jean throws the seeds at the beast. They are in the throat of the beast
The beast has the seeds, but Joan has the tea

title: The Train in Spain
sentences: The Train in Spain
The train in Spain runs on the rails. It runs on the rails each day
The train in Spain brings the mail. The train in Spain takes the soil
The boy waits for the train in Spain. He waits for the mail
The boy waits in the rain. He waits in the hail!
The boy gets the mail. The mail is a toy. The boy feels joy
The man waits for the train in Spain. He waits for the soil
He waits on the plain. He waits in the heat
The man gets the soil. He plants the grain. He feels joy
The train in Spain runs on the rails. It runs on the rails each day

title: The Fairgrounds
sentences: The Fairgrounds
The fair is in town. Burt and his sister go to the fairgrounds
They see boys play in the crowd. They see girls shop at the grounds
Outside the big tent, clowns shout! They jump around in the dirt
A fire eater has a burning shirt. But, she is not hurt!
Burt and his sister are on the big wheel. They can see the town and the grounds
They see singers sing aloud. They see jugglers in the crowd
Burt takes his turn in the bird game. He wins a crown!
His sister takes her turn in the bird game. She wins a brown gown
The fair is in town. Burt and his sister had fun at the fairgrounds!

title: Mark and the White Stork
sentences: Mark and the White Stork
The park is dark. The park is cool
Mark is at the park. He is snoring next to the pool
Mark looks up at the moon. He looks up at the stars
Mark hopes to soar to Mars. He hopes to soar to the North Star
A part forms in the pool. It is not dark!
A white stork zooms into the park! The stork has a hook
Mark's foot is on the hook. He hops on the white stork
Mark and the stork zoom to Mars! They zoom to the North Star
Mark wakes with a start! He is at the park, but it is not dark!
